title: Save $149 on 12.9-inch M1 iPad Pro in today’s best deals, plus Twelve South Apple gear and more
content:
All of today’s best deals have delivered a new Amazon low on the 12.9-inch M1 iPad Pro at $149 off. That’s alongside Twelve South Apple accessories from $65 and refurbished iPhone 12/Pro/Max handsets. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Save $149 on 12.9-inch M1 iPad Pro in today’s best deals, plus Twelve South Apple gear and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: 12.9-inch M1 iPad Pro is now down to a new all-time low at $149 off alongside Twelve South Apple accessories, and refurbished iPhone 12.
